div.p:
I have the honor by direction of the Trustees of the Royal Park to submit to you a copy of a letter addressed to the Borough Council of Brunswick
See M to F. Miles, 13 January 1870 (in this edition as 70-01-13b). for your information.

p.style: font-family: Geneva; font-size: 12pt; margin-left: 1.75in; margin-right: 0in; text-indent: 0in;

div.p: I have the honor to be
